scripts.build: npm run build -w @workbuoy/backend && npm run build -w @workbuoy/frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w @workbuoy/backend && npm run typecheck -w @workbuoy/frontend
scripts.test: npm run -w apps/backend test && npm run -w apps/frontend test
scripts.openapi:lint: bash -lc 'SPECS=$(git ls-files | grep -E "(^|/)(openapi\\.(ya?ml|json)|openapi/.+\\.(ya?ml|json))$" || true); if [ -z "$SPECS" ]; then echo "No OpenAPI specs found"; exit 0; fi; echo "$SPECS" | while read -r spec; do echo "=== Lint: $spec ==="; npx @stoplight/spectral-cli@6 lint "$spec" -r .spectral.yaml || true; done'
scripts.openapi:diff: bash -lc 'SPECS=$(git ls-files | grep -E "(^|/)(openapi\\.(ya?ml|json)|openapi/.+\\.(ya?ml|json))$" || true); if [ -z "$SPECS" ]; then echo "No OpenAPI specs found"; exit 0; fi; git fetch origin main:refs/remotes/origin/main >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; echo "$SPECS" | while read -r spec; do echo "=== Diff: $spec ==="; if git show origin/main:"$spec" >/dev/null 2>&1; then TMP=$(mktemp); git show origin/main:"$spec" > "$TMP"; npx openapi-diff@3.0.1 --fail-on-changed false --fail-on-incompatible false -f text "$TMP" "$spec" || true; rm -f "$TMP"; else echo "[new] $spec"; fi; echo; done'
